data.name: The Low Road - Win Well - Songs On The Low Road
data.detailed_description:
"Songs On The Low Road" is an EP that includes all of the vocal tracks from the point and click adventure game, The Low Road, written and performed by Win Well.

Track List:

1. Flight Patterns Plot (03:37)
2. Onto Greener Pastures (04:00)
3. When Night Falls Will It Lift Us? (03:59)
4. Rev Island (04:31)
5. Bellows Tending Fire (04:43)
6. When Night Falls Will It Lift Us? (Reprise) (03:06)

All files are in .mp3 format and are located in the "Win Well - Songs On The Low Road" sub directory.

Released July 25, 2017

Written and recorded by Win Well

Photo by Landon Speers
Illustration by Tallulah Fontaine

All songs appear in The Low Road, a point-and-click adventure game by XGen Studios.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Embedded
  • Additional Notes: 16:9 monitor recommended
